title: Two Sum
description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers that add up to target. Use unordered_map for O(1) lookup.
hints: Store each element's index while checking complement.

title: Reverse String
description: Reverse a vector<char> in place using two pointers.

title: Valid Anagram
description: Determine if two strings are anagrams using frequency counting.
hints: Count characters and compare frequency mismatch.

title: Contains Duplicate
description: Check whether array contains duplicate values using unordered_set.

title: Maximum Subarray
description: Find maximum sum of a contiguous subarray using Kadane’s algorithm.
hints: Track running sum and reset when negative.

title: Move Zeroes
description: Move all zeroes to the end while maintaining order of non-zero elements.

title: Single Number
description: Find the element appearing only once when others appear twice using XOR.

title: Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array
description: Return minimum element in rotated sorted array using binary search.

title: Valid Parentheses
description: Check if parentheses are valid using stack operations.
hints: Match closing bracket with top of stack.

title: Fibonacci Number
description: Compute the n-th Fibonacci value using iterative DP with O(1) space.
